title: R package for mapping UK health data
text: healthyr R package distributing UK health data:

title: R package for mapping UK health data
text: can install development version GitHub :

title: R package for mapping UK health data
text: add data sets package: Update data-raw/query-urls.R. Keep alphabetical ordering. Make sure build export tibble. Add file data-raw/. See files template. Document data set R/data.R. Keep alphabetical ordering. Run devtools::document() export documentation. Run broadcast::broadcast() export file .broadcast .csv. Run devtools::check() check errors/warnings/notes. Update LICENSE adding license new data set already covered.

title: R package for mapping UK health data
text: contribute project, please follow GitHub Flow submitting changes. Please note project released Contributor Code Conduct. participating project agree abide terms.

title: R package for mapping UK health data
text: See LICENSE
